trans-unit.resname: PL21·1 | Moraug, Fury of Akoum | Card Name
PL21·1 | Moraug, Fury of Akoum | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control gets +1/+0 for each time it has attacked this turn.\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if it's your main phase, there's an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: Each creature you control gets +1/+0 for each time it has attacked this turn.\nLandfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if it's your main phase, there's an additional combat phase after this phase. At the beginning of that combat, untap all creatures you control.

trans-unit.resname: PL21·1★ | Sethron, Hurloon General | Card Name
PL21·1★ | Sethron, Hurloon General | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken Minotaur enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/3 red Minotaur creature token.\n{2}{B/R}: Minotaurs you control get +1/+0 and gain menace and haste until end of turn. ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken Minotaur enters the battlefield under your control, create a 2/3 red Minotaur creature token.\n{2}{B/R}: Minotaurs you control get +1/+0 and gain menace and haste until end of turn. ({B/R} can be paid with either {B} or {R}.)

trans-unit.resname: PL21·2 | Ox of Agonas | Card Name
PL21·2 | Ox of Agonas | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.\nEscape—{R}{R}, Exile eight other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)\nCARDNAME escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, discard your hand, then draw three cards.\nEscape—{R}{R}, Exile eight other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)\nCARDNAME escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.

trans-unit.resname: PL21·3 | Angrath, the Flame-Chained | Card Name
PL21·3 | Angrath, the Flame-Chained | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.\n[−3]: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has mana value 3 or less.\n[−8]: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.\n[−3]: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has mana value 3 or less.\n[−8]: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: PL21·4 | Tahngarth, First Mate | Card Name
PL21·4 | Tahngarth, First Mate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked by more than one creature.\nWhenever an opponent attacks with one or more creatures, if Tahngarth is tapped, you may have that opponent gain control of Tahngarth until end of combat. If you do, choose a player or planeswalker that opponent is attacking. Tahngarth is attacking that player or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME can't be blocked by more than one creature.\nWhenever an opponent attacks with one or more creatures, if Tahngarth is tapped, you may have that opponent gain control of Tahngarth until end of combat. If you do, choose a player or planeswalker that opponent is attacking. Tahngarth is attacking that player or planeswalker.
